participant_1.background:
My thumbs are getting in the way of my typing, but I'm enjoying the peace and quiet of living by the lake.
I pretended to be a superhero with my kids and they loved it.
I have always been close to my family, even though we are not always in agreement.
I enjoy spending time with my son and training my troops.
i spend the weekends travelling up to canada to relax and enjoy the view.

participant_2.background:
I wake up early to feed my cats and then work on my laptops until it's time to get ready for my wedding in the park.
my favorite french fries are from mcdonald.
I am not married, but I do enjoy online shopping and collecting memories from my vacations.
I enjoy quiet activities in my free time, like reading, writing, and spending time in nature.
i am colour blind.

content.text: Hi! What a nice day out today, isn't it?
Yes, it is a beautiful day outside! I love the peace and quiet of nature.
Me too! It's so relaxing to just sit outside and enjoy the view.
Exactly! I also love to read and write in my free time.
That's great! I love to read as well, but I don't write much.
I like to write stories and poems. I'm actually working on a novel right now.
Oh wow, that's amazing! I've always wanted to write a novel, but I've never been able to finish one.
It's definitely a challenge, but it's so rewarding when you finally finish it.
I can imagine! I'm sure it's a great feeling.
It is! I'm really excited to see how it turns out.
I'm sure it will be great! You're a very talented writer.
Thank you! That means a lot to me.
You're welcome! I'm really glad we met. I think we're going to be great friends.
Me too! I'm excited to get to know you better.
